con:testStep.name: Given i request an access token

con:restRequest.name: Given i request an access token

con:testStep.name: When i input a user's information

con:config.con:property: Life - Future Insurability or Business Safeguard
Essential LA - Per Mille Loading term
LAB - Cancer Upgrade Per Mille Loading $
LAB - Cancer Upgrade Per Mille Loading term
DI - Cover Type (Agreed Value, Indemnity etc)
DI - Child Care benefit - No. children
Start Up - Waiver of premium (compulsory with Start Up)
PH - Child cover (Number of lives aged <20)
PH - Child specialist (Number of lives aged <20)
PWH - Premiums on other adult lives (same frequency!)

con:testStep.name: And i request products and benefits

con:restRequest.name: And i request products and benefits

con:settings.con:setting: <entry key="Authorization" value="${And i extract the token#result}" xmlns="http://eviware.com/soapui/config"/>

con:restRequest.name: And i get premium

con:settings.con:setting: <entry key="Authorization" value="${And i extract the token#result}" xmlns="http://eviware.com/soapui/config"/>

con:config.script:
def _api = context.expand( '${And i get premium#Response#$[\'Quote\'][\'TotalPremium\']}' ) as float def _sheet = context.expand( '${When i input a user\'s information#LIFE}' ) as float
def _diff = Math.abs(_api-_sheet) def _diff_rate = Math.round(_diff / _sheet * 10000) / 100 def _diff_round = Math.round(_diff * 100) / 100 testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue("DIFF", (_diff_round).toString())
String str = _diff ? _diff_rate.toString() + '%' : _diff_rate.toString() if (_diff && !_diff_rate) str = '<0.01%' testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue("DIFF_RATE", str)
testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue("PASS", _diff_round <= 0.01 ? "YES" : "NO")
